title: Three Bedroom with Fireplace and Washer/Dryer Included
neighborhood: 3100 River Exchange Drive, Sandy Springs, GA
posting_body: Come take a tour our this gorgeous three bed two bath apartment!
It features a gas fireplace in the living room, stainless steel appliances and washer and dryer in the unit.
At Retreat at River Park, our residents will find the perfect place to call home.
With our awesome amenities in each home and throughout our stunning community our apartments will accommodate every lifestyle.
Our exceptional apartments and spectacular amenities paired with our courteous team will surpass all of your expectations.
Enjoy the carefree lifestyle that you deserve!
• Full Size Washer and Dryer in Units
Visit our website at: <URL>/ to check our availability.
